user.title: WillyWeather Setup - Station Selection
user.description:
Step 1 of 7: Enter your WillyWeather API key.

**Get your API key:**
Visit https://www.willyweather.com.au/api/register.html to register and obtain your free API key.

**Station ID:**
Leaving the Station ID blank will automatically set it to the closest WillyWeather station to your Home Assistant Home Zone location. You can also manually enter a specific station ID if preferred.

prefix.title: WillyWeather Setup - Entity Prefix
prefix.description:
Step 2 of 7: Configure the entity ID prefix for {station_name}

**Default Entity Prefix:**
The default prefix includes your location name (e.g., "ww_melbourne" creates entities like sensor.ww_melbourne_temperature).

**Customization:**
You can edit the entire prefix to your preference, or leave it empty for no prefix.

observational.title: WillyWeather Setup - Observational Sensors
observational.description:
Step 3 of 7: Configure observational sensors for {station_name}

**Observational Sensors** (base requirement):
- Provides current weather conditions: temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc. (updated every 10-30 minutes)
- **Requires:** Weather --> Observational enabled in your WillyWeather API admin

**Optional Additional Sensors** (each requires corresponding API admin settings):

**Extended Text:**
- Detailed forecast text for today (e.g., "Mostly sunny day. Slight chance of shower...")
- Creates 'Today's Extended Forecast' sensor (state truncated to 255 chars, full text in 'full_text' attribute)
- **Requires:** Weather --> Region Precis enabled in WillyWeather API admin (extra API call, adds cost)

**UV:**
- UV index sensors
- **Requires:** Weather --> Forecasts --> UV enabled in WillyWeather API admin (also enables UV in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)

**Tides:**
- Tide information (coastal locations only, not all areas have tidal information)
- **Requires:** Weather --> Forecasts --> Tides enabled in WillyWeather API admin (also enables Tides in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)

**Swell:**
- Swell data (coastal locations only, not all areas have swell information)
- **Requires:** Weather --> Forecasts --> Swell, Swell-Height and Swell-Period enabled in WillyWeather API admin (also enables Swell in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)

**Note:** If features aren't enabled in your API admin, they will be silently skipped.

data.include_observational: Include observational sensors (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc.)

forecast_options.title: WillyWeather Setup - Forecast Data Options
forecast_options.description:
Step 4 of 7: Configure forecast data options for {station_name}

**Wind Forecast:**
- Adds wind speed/direction to weather.get_forecasts service and forecast sensors
- **Requires:** Weather --> Forecasts --> Wind enabled in WillyWeather API admin

**Forecast Sensors:**
- Create individual sensors for each day (temperature, rain, UV, tides, swell, wind, etc.)
- No additional API calls required (uses existing forecast data)
- Perfect for custom Lovelace cards and automation triggers
- Enable the checkbox below to select specific sensors in step 6

**Important:** Both weather.get_forecasts service and forecast sensors only include data for features enabled in your WillyWeather API admin (this screen and previous observational sensors screen).

data.include_forecast_sensors: Include daily forecast sensors (if enabled, you'll select which sensors in step 6)

warnings.title: WillyWeather Setup - Weather Warning Sensors

forecast_sensors.title: WillyWeather Setup - Forecast Sensor Selection
forecast_sensors.description:
Step 6 of 7: Select which forecast sensors to create for {station_name}

**Select Sensors:**
Choose which data points to track for each forecast day.

**Number of Days:**
Select how many days to forecast (1 = today only, 7 = today + next 6 days).

**Note:** Extended forecast text is available in the 'Today's Extended Forecast' observational sensor (if enabled in Step 3).

update_intervals.title: WillyWeather Setup - Update Intervals
update_intervals.description:
Step 7 of 7: Configure update intervals for {station_name}

Separate intervals for observational (current conditions) and forecast data reduce API usage.

**Default setup:**
- Observational: 10/30 min (day/night)
- Forecast: 30/60 min (day/night)
- Total: ~7,920 API calls/month

data.night_start_hour: Night start hour (0-23, e.g., 21 for 9 PM)
data.night_end_hour: Night end hour (0-23, e.g., 7 for 7 AM)

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure WillyWeather
reconfigure.description:
Update your WillyWeather API credentials or station for {station_name}.

**Note:** Changing the station ID will update your integration to use a different weather station. Leave the station ID blank to keep the current station.

data.station_id: Station ID (leave blank to keep current)

error.no_station_found: Could not find any WillyWeather station near your location. Try specifying a station ID manually.
error.search_failed: Error searching for station. Check your internet connection and API key.
error.invalid_station_or_key: Invalid station ID or API key. Please verify both are correct.

init.title: WillyWeather Observational Sensors
init.description:
Configure observational sensors (current weather conditions).

**Observational Sensors** (base requirement):
- Current weather data updated every 10-30 minutes
- **Requires:** Weather --> Observational enabled in your WillyWeather API admin

**Optional Additional Sensors** (each requires corresponding API admin settings):

**Extended Text:** Requires Weather --> Region Precis (extra API call, adds cost)
**UV:** Requires Weather --> Forecasts --> UV (also enables UV in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)
**Tides:** Requires Weather --> Forecasts --> Tides (also enables Tides in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)
**Swell:** Requires Weather --> Forecasts --> Swell, Swell-Height and Swell-Period (also enables Swell in forecast calls via weather.get_forecasts)

Changing these options will reload the integration.

data.include_observational: Include observational sensors (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc.)

forecast_options.title: WillyWeather Forecast Data Options
forecast_options.description:
Configure forecast data options.

**Wind Forecast:**
- Adds wind speed/direction to weather.get_forecasts service and forecast sensors
- **Requires:** Weather --> Forecasts --> Wind enabled in WillyWeather API admin

**Forecast Sensors:**
- Individual sensors for each day (no additional API calls required)

**Important:** Both weather.get_forecasts service and forecast sensors only include data for features enabled in your WillyWeather API admin.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

forecast_sensors.title: WillyWeather Forecast Sensor Selection
forecast_sensors.description:
Select which forecast sensors to create.

**Sensors:** Choose data points to track.
**Days:** Number of forecast days (1 = today only, 7 = today + next 6 days).

**Note:** Extended forecast text is available in the 'Today's Extended Forecast' observational sensor (if enabled).

Changing these options will reload the integration.

warnings.title: WillyWeather Weather Warning Sensors
warnings.description:
Configure weather warning sensors.

**Weather Warnings:** Binary sensors that alert you to dangerous weather conditions.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

update_intervals.title: WillyWeather Update Intervals
update_intervals.description:
Configure separate update intervals for observational and forecast data.

Separate intervals reduce API usage while keeping current conditions fresh. Changing these options will reload the integration.

**Cost reference:** AUD $0.20 per 1000 requests

data.night_end_hour: Night end hour (0-23, e.g., 7 for 7 AM)
